title: Championship Weekend and Betting on Super Bowl LV
description:
Sharp and Verno look back at championship weekend to determine how much blame the Packers deserve in their loss and whether the Buccaneers are truly the best team in the NFC. Later, they look ahead to Super Bowl LV early betting numbers.
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Chris Vernon
